thread.title: Clean, Adorable, Tiny Hotel
thread.title_full: Clean, Adorable, Tiny Hotel - Review of 414 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pll03a
title: Clean, Adorable, Tiny Hotel
text: Unique experience in NYC. Tiny, clean, absolutely adorable hotel that feels like visiting dear friends. Friendly owner and staff that know your name and are willing to help any way they can. Wonderful breakfast spread included in price, plus a wine and cheese spread each evening, also included in price. Rooms are not fancy, but beds/linens very comfortable. Small dining area/lobby encourages guests to get to visit with each other. We really loved this place. You must be able to climb stairs if you stay here.
